attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever used
attributes.review: Literally tried to covert me into a conservative bigot. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Scarred
attributes.review: I opened the app just to be blinded😵 by the sight of a dried up cheese puff🤢 that seems to have grown long strands of mold🤮. Incredibly traumatizing🧚‍♀️.

attributes.title: SCAM!!!
attributes.review: This app stole my credit card information and forced me to sell my soul to the Trump campaign!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I came hoping to find MY president and instead found an Oompa Loompa. Tragedy.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: Completely and totally disappointed with this man

attributes.title: So disappointed
attributes.review: What’s there to say, my experience with Donald J Trump has been like a nightmare.

attributes.title: WHY DOES THIS APP HAVE SO MANY POPUPS GHJENJDWNK
attributes.review: Title basically. I love Donald trump, just not enough to deal with these pop ups. I don't have erectile dysfunction anyways. ugh.
